ygData.subject: New patch Tuesday, who hates us at Verant?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sigh. After the last late night patch, I discovered the recently discussed stacking of magic resist songs no longer works. What s up with that? Was this too
ygData.messageBody:
Sigh. After the last late night patch, I discovered the recently
discussed stacking of magic resist songs no longer works. What's up with
that? Was this too powerful a benefit? Meanwhile, the accellerando still
cancels sow when it wears off, as does levitate and of course the L30
song still doesnt work. Wish they would take a break from nerfing and
fix some bugs.

I also discovered with great joy that our music skills are capped at 200
along with our combat skills. Guess I can't complain about that too much
as even a warrior's combat skills cap at 200, and you'd think the
warrior would be better at them than other fighters. But if that's the
case, why are the magic users still shooting up over 200 in their
casting skills?

A very depressed L41 bard. :(


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
